experience.title: Product Analyst
experience.description: - Actively engaged in stakeholder meetings to collaboratively shape robust go-to-market strategies.- Conducted comprehensive market analysis, assessing operational performance and recommending growth metrics, resulting in a 10% to 20% increase in customer retention.- Worked on coordinating and implementing outsourcing of digital marketing partners.- Led the establishment of a comprehensive vendor database, generating and nurturing leads. publications: [{"title":"A Detailed Review on Object Detection Algorithms","subtitle":"IEEE","date":"May 24, 2023","description":"This study focuses on reviewing the available algorithms to assist in the detection of object based on time and accuracy. The end result will help to identify the best available algorithm that can achieve faster object detection. The algorithms taken for the review process are CNN (Convolutional Neural Networks), RCNN, Fast CNN, Faster RCNN, Single shot, YOLO (You Only Look Once)."}]
patents: [{"title":"SYSTEM AND METHOD TO IDENTIFY VEHICLES VIOLATING PROTOCOLS","date_issued":"March 11, 2022","patents_id":"202111029998","description":"The present invention provides a system and method based on image sensing and analysis of vehicular policy compliance status. One or more image sensor captures images of the body of the vehicle with an emphasis on the standard template compliance of registration plate rules. The vehicle is categorized on a plurality of parameters such as dimensions of alphanumeric characters on the registration plate, the absolute prohibition of any other language or symbols except registration marks, light, heavy, and moderate-sized vehicle embodiments. Different embodiments of the present disclosure are assigned to perform the procedures implicating data sensing, processing, comparison and alert transmission. Images are analysed and compared with stored dataset of standard policies in the database, pertaining to vehicular compliance with road transport and highway norms."}]
